Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 31 mins
features: 🎮🎮【Built-in 100000+ Retro Games】Uberwith Retro game box built in 100000+ Retro games, bringing you back to Childhood Memories. Include Pre-install 19+ emulators, and pack with 128GB(100000+games) TF card. No need to download and install ,you can play games just by connecting to the TV.
🎮🎮【Dual System】 Uberwith game box have both Game and TV function. Plug and play, no extra operation, Enjoy the joy of TV and games with your family at any time
🎮🎮【HDMI HD output】Equipped with upgraded chip, the game is more smooth and stable. Come with an Extended HDMI Cable,supports 1080P. Please make sure your TV/Monitor has an HDMI input port.

🎮🎮【2 Wireless Controllers】Comes With an TV Remote & 2 PCS 2.4GHz wireless controller, the connection is stable and almost zero latency.Maximum connection distance is 32.8 ft. (2 wireless controllers need to install 4 AAA batteries, not included in package).
🎮🎮【Great Gift】It is great fun to experience retro games with friends or family,Bring back memories of your childhood. This game console will make a great gift for your kids, friends, and family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to connect the game box to TV ? Use the HDMI cable in the box to connect the game box to the TV. Whether this box has the functions of an Android box ? Yes, the Uberwith game box is an Android TV box, you can enjoy the TV function after linked network. When I connect the TV for the first time, the picture is stuck. How to solve it ? The first use requires a lot of game content to load, so there is a very small chance of stutter, you only need to re-plug the box power supply to solve the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lots of repeats, not really 100,000 games
reviews.reviewText: The games that are there do work, of course it’s impossible to play every one. I bought this hoping to have access to some old arcade games that I used to play back in the 80’s.Some are there but not all. The down side of this system is it will say that there are 15,000 games in the MAME directory but after about 600 or so, they repeat, so it keeps duplicating that same 600 over and over again. It seems to do this in other categories as well.PS1 and N64 have about 100 in each directory.I apologize if I am forgetting anything but hopefully this review helps.So in conclusion, if you’re really looking for truely 100,000 then this may not be the system for you. It has MAME, Super Famicom, GB, GBA, PS1, PSP and N64*** if you favorite any games it just throws them at the beginning of the directory and it also duplicates those over and over instead of putting them in a separate Favorite directory which is also disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
